This is a fanedit of the Star Trek Enterprise episodes s4e18 and s4e19: In A Mirror, Darkly. This two parter has been converted into a single movie to improve the pace of the story telling and help make the viewer forget this is TV. The In A Mirror, Darkly episodes are highly rated and they take place in the Mirror, Mirror alternate reality - perfect for making them into a single movie.
 
Edits:
* Removed the breaks for commercials
* Removed the fades after commercial breaks
* Moved the s4e18 opening credits to the very start
* Removed the s4e18 closing credits
* Removed the s4e19 "Previously on Enterprise" recap and s4e19 opening credits
* Blacked out the text of "In A Mirror, Darkly, Part II"
